attributes.action: Stop any discussion on Croatia's future EU membership until it makes positive steps to re-establish its pre-war ethnic population proportions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Croatia's government has made no investment in areas traditionally inhabited by non-Croats. Infrastructure is below standard, and commerce is non-existant, resulting in very few returning refugees from the civil war. The trend would indicate that Croatia will have completely removed all traces of no-Croat families within the next 2 generations.
